short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyze your followers and track your reciprocal follows with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily find out who on Medium is following you back! This Chrome extension saves you time by automating the process of checking mutual followers. Whether you're a writer, blogger, or just love engaging with others on Medium, this tool makes it simple to manage your connections.

Key Features:

Instantly see which Medium followers follow you back
Clean, user-friendly interface
Saves you from manual checks in endless follower lists
Optimized for Medium's platform
Start managing your Medium followers effortlessly today!

How to Use:

Go to your medium following page
Open the extension
Click "Analyze Followers" button
Wait for the analysis to complete
Start checking who follows you back!
